content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (12 ounce) package refrigerated biscuit dough" )
( ing-1 "1 (8 ounce) package corn bread mix" )

content.text: 0) Prepare biscuits (enough to make 4 cups crumbled), and one 8x8 inch pan cornbread according to package directions.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Prepare"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "biscuits"@11:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "one 8x8 inch pan cornbread"@58:84 / FOOD )
		:mnr ( "according to package directions"@85:116 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-2-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-2-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-2-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) In a small pot, combine onion, celery, margarine and chicken broth.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "combine"@19:26 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "onion"@27:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "celery"@34:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "margarine"@42:51 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "chicken broth"@56:69 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "a small pot"@6:17 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Bring to boil and cook vegetables until tender.
5) In a 2-quart casserole dish, combine 4 cups crumbled cornbread, 4 cups biscuit crumbs, salt, pepper, sausage, chopped eggs and sage.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "combine"@32:39 / AC
		:ppt ( "4 cups crumbled cornbread"@40:65 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "4 cups biscuit crumbs"@67:88 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "salt"@90:94 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "pepper"@96:102 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "sausage"@104:111 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "chopped eggs"@113:125 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "sage"@130:134 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "a 2-quart casserole dish"@6:30 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Pour broth and vegetables over bread mixture, and stir until combined.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Pour"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "broth"@8:13 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "vegetables"@18:28 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "bread mixture"@34:47 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-1 "stir"@53:57 / AC
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until combined"@58:72 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Bake in the preheated oven for 30 to 45 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:loc ( tool-7-0 "the preheated oven"@11:29 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "30 to 45 minutes"@34:50 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
